long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Browser Extension enables you to securely connect to a KERIA Identity wallet and manage your Identifiers and Verifiable Credentials. Its based on KERI/ACDC protocols and supports the GLEIF vLEI ecosystem.

Web application can use the browser extension to authenticate with your Identifiers and Verifiable Credentials without the risk of exposing your private information. It can also be used to sign documents such as financial reports with your consent.

This is an open source project from the WebOfTrust community. You can find it at https://github.com/weboftrust/signify-browser-extension.
